articles.title: Trump-Ramaphosa meeting: White crosses shown by US president not graves, says man who erected them - BBC
articles.description: The US president had said the crosses were evidence of attacks on white farmers in South Africa.
articles.content:
Ed Habershon
The man who organised a display of white crosses in South Africa, an image of which was shown by Donald Trump on Wednesday, has said that the US president was wrong when he described it… [+3034 chars]
